item.title: Attending My First KubeCon
item.description: Well, itâ€™s been 4 Months since I came back from KubeCon EU 2023 and this blog post has been on my TODO list since then but the more I thought of writing about it there were some more priority things to do and I had to deprioritize this Blog post. But now after spending some weekends on it, I have just pinned down the experience I had attending my first KubeCon.
